solution_line_template: He uses {normal_buckets_used} buckets to fill his bath normally because {total_buckets_to_fill} - {buckets_to_take_away} = <<{total_buckets_to_fill}-{buckets_to_take_away}={normal_buckets_used}>>{normal_buckets_used}
He uses {ounces_per_day} ounces a day for his baths because {normal_buckets_used} x {bucket_capacity_ounces} = <<{normal_buckets_used}*{bucket_capacity_ounces}={ounces_per_day}>>{ounces_per_day}
He uses {ounces_per_week} ounces a week for his baths because {days_in_week} x {ounces_per_day} = <<{days_in_week}*{ounces_per_day}={ounces_per_week}>>{ounces_per_week}
